module.name: ImgList
module.short: Contains definitions for TCustomImageList, the base class for TImageList.

element.name: TImageIndex
element.short: Type of an ImageList index (integer), unused!
element.descr: Exists for Delphi compatibility only, but is unused there as well.

element.name: TChangeLink
element.short: Use a TChangelink to get notified of imagelist changes.

element.name: TChangeLink.Change
element.short: Change - software emulation of the OnChange event

element.name: TChangeLink.OnChange
element.short: OnChange - event handler for a change in the Imagelist

element.name: TChangeLink.Sender
element.short: Sender - the imagelist that has notified us of a change

element.name: TDrawingStyle
element.short: Defines transparency and blending of rendered images.
element.descr: Blending means that the Color is merged with the previous contents of the destination area by a degree defined by an alpha value.

element.name: TDrawingStyle.dsFocus
element.short: Applies 25% of BlendColor.

element.name: TDrawingStyle.dsSelected
element.short: Applies 50% of BlendColor.

element.name: TDrawingStyle.dsNormal
element.short: Draw using BkColor for the background, transparent if BkColor is clNone.

element.name: TDrawingStyle.dsTransparent
element.short: Always draw transparently, ignore BkColor and BlendColor.

element.name: TImageType
element.short: Indicates whether a mask shall be used in rendering an image.
element.descr: The mask specifies the transparent part of the image

element.name: TImageType.itImage
element.short: Don't apply a mask.

element.name: TImageType.itMask
element.short: Apply the mask.

element.name: TCustomImageList
element.short: Base class for TImageList (not the same as a TBitmap collection)

descr.p: An ImageList contains images (bitmaps or icons) of the same Width and Height, accessible by index. The images are stored in one big (wide) bitmap, whose width is Width*Count.
When an image of a different Width or Height is inserted, the previous contents of the list are discarded!

It's okay, however, to insert an imagelist-like bitmap, that contains multiple bitmaps of the same Width and Height as used by the ImageList. This allows to insert e.g. other (compatible) ImageLists, or bitmaps for multiple states of essentially the same image (button pressed, released and disabled).
Transparency is implemented in the alpha channel of the raw 32 bit RGBA imagedata array - but not all platforms support such an alpha channel.

The painting of an image from the list is handled by the widgetset, no bitmap or icon component is involved. The widgetset can use a different internal organization of the data, optimized for immediate painting of an image.
NOTE: A TCustomImageList is not a TBitmap collection. If a storage of distinct bitmaps is needed, create your own list of TBitMaps (array or TList).

Please note also that inserting or moving images will affect the index of all following images, what can cause trouble with index constants. In such cases a bitmap collection may better fit your needs.
descr.remark: Windows ImgageLists can contain a list of monochrome mask bitmaps, present when Masked=True.

errors.p: Currently only the insertion of Bitmaps is supported. Other image types should be rendered as bitmaps of Width and Height, which then can be inserted.

element.name: TCustomImageList.FAllocCount
element.short: The size of the allocated Data list, in number of images.

element.name: TCustomImageList.FChanged
element.short: Change flag, remembers changes while update notifications are locked (FUpdateCount > 0).

element.name: TCustomImageList.FChangeLinkList
element.short: List of TChangeLinks which are notified of changes.

element.name: TCustomImageList.FData
element.short: Holds the pixel data of all images.

element.name: TCustomImageList.FUpdateCount
element.short: Counter for BeginUpdate/EndUpdate calls.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AllocData
element.short: Allocates data for ACount images, rounded up by AllocBy.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AllocData.ACount
element.short: The number of images to allocate room for.
element.descr: The list only can increase. Use Clear to reduce it to the empty list.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalInsert
element.short: Insert bitmap (with split if necessary) into position AIndex with shifting other images.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalInsert.AIndex
element.short: Where to insert the images.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalInsert.AImage
element.short: The image (BitMap) handle.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalInsert.AMask
element.short: The mask (BitMap) handle.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalInsert.AWidth
element.short: Width [of?] in pixels

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalInsert.AHeight
element.short: Height of all images in pixels.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalMove
element.short: Moves an image from CurIndex to NewIndex, without notifying the widgetset.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalMove.ACurIndex
element.short: the index of the image to be moved

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalMove.ANewIndex
element.short: the new index of the image

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalSetImage
element.short: Copies the imagedata into the FData array and then frees the image.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalSetImage.Result
element.short: Pointer to the updated image data

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalSetImage.AIndex
element.short: the index of the location where the image should be set

element.name: TCustomImageList.InternalSetImage.AImage
element.short: the new image

element.name: TCustomImageList.NotifyChangeLink
element.short: Notifies all subscribed objects of a change in the imagelist.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Initialize
element.short: Initialize - sets up the list
element.descr: Initializes the internal bitmap structures and the changelink list. It is used by the Create and CreateSize constructors.

element.name: TCustomImageList.SetWidthHeight
element.short: Sets both the Width and Height of all images.
element.descr: Changed values clear the entire list.

element.name: TCustomImageList.WriteData
element.short: Writes the ImageList data into the stream.

element.name: TCustomImageList.ReadData
element.short: Restores the ImageList data from the stream.

element.name: TCustomImageList.BeginUpdate
element.short: Start updating the data, block the OnChange event.

descr.p: Use together with EndUpdate to speed up the insertion of multiple images.
Every BeginUpdate must be matched by an EndUpdate, i.e. update operations can be nested.

element.name: TCustomImageList.EndUpdate
element.short: EndUpdate - finish updating the data, call Change.
element.descr: Decrements the internal UpdateCount and, when it reaches zero, does whatever is required to reflect the new content.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Add
element.short: Adds an Image and Mask bitmap to the list. Returns the index of the added image or -1 if unsucessful.

descr.pre: Adds one or more (bitmap width / imagelist width) bitmaps to the list. If Mask is nil, the image has no transparent parts.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Add.Result
element.short: The index of the added image, -1 if unsuccesful.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Add.Image
element.short: a bitmap image

element.name: TCustomImageList.Add.Mask
element.short: a bitmap which defines the transparent parts of Image

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddIcon
element.short: Adds an icon to the list, returning the index of the icon or -1 if not successful.
element.descr: Adding graphics other than bitmaps can be implemented by converting the graphics item into a bitmap, which then can be added to the image list. Most graphics classes support such a conversion, so that specialized methods are redundant.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddIcon.Result
element.short: The index of the added icon, -1 if unsuccesful.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddIcon.Image
element.short: The Icon to be added.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddImages
element.short: Adds images from another imagelist to the list.
element.descr: Both lists must have the same image Width and Height, else the old images are discarded.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddImages.AValue
element.short: The ImageList containing the images to add.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddMasked
element.short: Adds one or more (bitmap width / imagelist width) transparent bitmaps to the list.

descr.p: Every pixel of MaskColor will become transparent.
Image can contain multiple images of the same Width and Height. The image width must be a multiple of Width, and the image height must equal Height, else all old images in the list are discarded.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddMasked.Result
element.short: The index of the first added image, -1 if unsuccesful.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddMasked.Image
element.short: The bitmap to be added.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddMasked.MaskColor
element.short: The color acting as transparant color.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddLazarusResource
element.short: Loads a bitmap from a lazarus resources and adds it.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddLazarusResource.Result
element.short: Index of the first added image.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddLazarusResource.ResourceName
element.short: The name of the Lazarus resource.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AddLazarusResource.MaskColor
element.short: The mask color for transparent images, clNone for solid (opaque) images.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Change
element.short: Send change notifications, if the list has changed and updates are not locked.
element.descr: Notifies all members of the ChangeLinkList, and calls the OnChange handler.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Clear
element.short: Removes all images from the list.

element.name: TCustomImageList.CreateSize
element.short: Initialize the list for image(s) with the given height and width.

descr.p: This constructor overrides the default initial size of the images (16x16 pixels).

The Width and Height is reset with every insertion of a bitmap. It may be useful, however, to initialize a list for the insertion of graphics other than bitmaps, so that the images can be rendered as bitmaps of the intended width and height, before they are inserted.

element.name: TCustomImageList.CreateSize.AWidth
element.short: The width of all images, in pixels.

element.name: TCustomImageList.CreateSize.AHeight
element.short: The height of all images, in pixels.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Delete
element.short: Delete the specified image.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Delete.AIndex
element.short: the index of the image to be deleted. -1 for delete all.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Draw
element.short: Paint an image
element.descr: Paints the image specified by AIndex on Canvas at position AX, AY.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Draw.AIndex
element.short: The image index.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Draw.AEnabled
element.short: If False, draw the image disabled (dithered).

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetBitmap
element.short: Copies the selected image into the given bitmap

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetBitmap.Index
element.short: the index of the requested image

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetBitmap.Image
element.short: a bitmap as a container for the bitmap

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetBitmap.AEffect
element.short: how to copy

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetHotSpot
element.short: Returns the offset from the drawing position to the image origin.
element.descr: A HotSpot is used only in a TDragImageList, here it is (0,0).

element.name: TCustomImageList.Insert
element.short: Inserts one or more images into the list at the index position.

descr.p: The inserted bitmap can consist of multiple images, of the same width and height, which become accessible as distinct images in the ImageList.

The height of the inserted images must match the ImageList height, else the ImageList content is replaced by the added images. The width must be a multiple of the ImageList width, so that the list always contains an integral number of images.
If Mask is nil, the inserted images have no transparent parts. Use InsertMasked to insert bitmaps with a specific transparent color.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Insert.AIndex
element.short: insert position

element.name: TCustomImageList.Insert.AImage
element.short: bitmap to insert

element.name: TCustomImageList.Insert.AMask
element.short: transparency mask, Nil for opaque

element.name: TCustomImageList.InsertIcon
element.short: Insert an Icon into the list.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InsertIcon.AIndex
element.short: insertion point

element.name: TCustomImageList.InsertIcon.AIcon
element.short: The Icon to insert.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InsertMasked
element.short: Adds one or more transparent bitmaps to the list.
element.descr: MaskColor is the RGB color of the transparent pixels. Every occurence of a MaskColor pixel will be converted into a transparent pixel.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InsertMasked.Index
element.short: The index of the inserted image.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InsertMasked.AImage
element.short: The bitmap to be inserted.

element.name: TCustomImageList.InsertMasked.MaskColor
element.short: The color acting as transparant color.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Move
element.short: Move an image from index CurIndex to NewIndex.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Move.ACurIndex
element.short: the index of the image to be moved

element.name: TCustomImageList.Move.ANewIndex
element.short: the new index of the image

element.name: TCustomImageList.Replace
element.short: Replace the indexed image with the Bitmap given
element.descr: AMask can be nil, if the image has no transparent parts.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Replace.AIndex
element.short: the index of the replaceded image

element.name: TCustomImageList.Replace.AImage
element.short: a bitmap image

element.name: TCustomImageList.Replace.AMask
element.short: a bitmap which defines the transparent parts of Image

element.name: TCustomImageList.ReplaceMasked
element.short: ReplaceMasked - replaces the indexed image with the image given.
element.descr: Every pixel of MaskColor will be converted to transparent.

element.name: TCustomImageList.ReplaceMasked.Index
element.short: The index of the replaced image.

element.name: TCustomImageList.ReplaceMasked.NewImage
element.short: A bitmap image.

element.name: TCustomImageList.ReplaceMasked.MaskColor
element.short: The color acting as transparant color.

element.name: TCustomImageList.RegisterChanges
element.short: Registers an TChangeLink object to get notified of a change of the imagelist.

element.name: TCustomImageList.RegisterChanges.Value
element.short: a reference to changelink object

element.name: TCustomImageList.UnRegisterChanges
element.short: Unregisters an notification object.

element.name: TCustomImageList.UnRegisterChanges.Value
element.short: Reference to the changelink object to remove.

element.name: TCustomImageList.AllocBy
element.short: The length of the image list is increased in multiples of AllocBy images. Default is 4.
element.descr: Other list types allow to set the list Capacity directly - not so for an ImageList.

element.name: TCustomImageList.BlendColor
element.short: The color for used in blending (dithering) an image.

element.name: TCustomImageList.BkColor
element.short: The background color to use for transparent parts.

descr.p: BkColor is intended to speed up drawing of transparent images, on a background of known color (=BkColor). In this case the image can be drawn opaque, eliminating the need for really masking out and merging with existing background.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Count
element.short: The number of images in the list

element.name: TCustomImageList.DrawingStyle
element.short: The default drawing style - focussed, selected, normal or transparent.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Height
element.short: The unique height of all images in the list.
element.descr: Setting to an different value clears the entire list!

element.name: TCustomImageList.Width
element.short: The unique width of all images in the list.
element.descr: Setting to an different value clears the entire list!

element.name: TCustomImageList.OnChange
element.short: OnChange - event handler for a change in the imagelist

element.name: TCustomImageList.Masked
element.short: True when mask images are stored with every image (unused!).
element.descr: This property exists only for Delphi compatibility

element.name: TCustomImageList.ShareImages
element.short: True when this image list is shared. Unused!
element.descr: This property exists only for Delphi compatibility. True means that the imagelist widget is freed together with the ImageList

element.name: TCustomImageList.ImageType
element.short: Unused!
element.descr: This property exists only for Delphi compatibility

element.name: TCustomImageList.FillDescription
element.short: FillDescription - fills the description with the default info of the imagedata

element.name: TCustomImageList.FillDescription.ADesc
element.short: the description to copy

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetFullBitmap.Image
element.short: the target bitmap

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetFullBitmap.AEffect
element.short: how to copy

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetFullRawImage
element.short: Exports the entire internal image (color array) and description.

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetRawImage
element.short: Exports an image as TRawImage.

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetRawImage.Index
element.short: the index of the image to copy

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetRawImage.Image
element.short: the target bitmap

element.name: TCustomImageList.Reference
element.short: Reference to the imagelist

element.name: TCustomImageList.CheckIndex
element.short: Assures that Index is not out of the list bound.
element.errors: Raises an EInvalidOperation exception when the index is out of bounds.

element.name: TCustomImageList.CheckIndex.AIndex
element.short: The index to check.

element.name: TCustomImageList.CheckIndex.AForInsert
element.short: Set to True when the index is used for insertion (default is False).

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetReferenceHandle
element.short: Returns the Handle of the Reference.

element.name: TCustomImageList.GetReferenceHandle.Result
element.short: The widget handle.

element.name: TCustomImageList.WSCreateReference
element.short: Instructs the widgtset to create an imagelist.

element.name: TCustomImageList.WSCreateReference.Result
element.short: Reference object for the created widget.

element.name: TCustomImageList.WSCreateReference.AParams
element.short: ignored

element.name: TCustomImageList.StretchDraw
element.short: Draws an image stretched to ARect.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Equals
element.short: Check for equivalence with another ImageList
element.descr: This is an expensive operation, since both imagelists are written into memory streams, which then are compared bytewise.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Equals.Result
element.short: True when the image lists are equal.

element.name: TCustomImageList.Equals.Obj
element.short: The object (ImageList) to compare with.
